summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4420 for the improvement of West 85th Street from 3rd Avenue Northwest to 8th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52237, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
